title: Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12", Locking Metal Food Tongs Non-Slip Grip
descriptions:
Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 – 9" and 12"

Upgrade your kitchen and grill toolkit with the Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set. Thoughtfully designed for everyday cooking and outdoor BBQs, this two-piece set delivers strong grip, smooth control, and long-lasting durability.

Key features:
- Premium stainless steel: Sturdy, lightweight, and built to resist rust and corrosion for long-term reliability.
- Two versatile sizes: Includes 9-inch cooking tongs for stovetop tasks and 12-inch grill tongs for safe distance handling at the BBQ.
- Heat-ready performance: Metal tong heads and a heat-resistant, silicon-cushioned handle keep you in control while protecting your hands.
- Ergonomic, non-slip handles: Comfortable silicon cushioning provides secure grip and better control when flipping burgers, turning fish, serving salad, or handling roast meats.
- Safe-by-design: Updated edge design lowers the risk of accidental cuts, reduces wobbling, and enhances stability while gripping food.
- Easy lock and store: Pull-ring locking mechanism to lock; push to unlock. Space-saving lock and integrated hanging loop make drawer or hook storage simple.
- Low-maintenance: Easy to handle and dishwasher safe to keep them looking like new.

Perfect for:
- Indoor kitchen tasks and meal prep
- Outdoor grilling and BBQ turning
- Flipping burgers and fish
- Cutting and serving roast meat
- Tossing and serving salads

What’s in the box:
- 1 x 9-inch cooking tong
- 1 x 12-inch BBQ grill tong

Dependable, comfortable, and ready for heat—Hotec tongs are the everyday tools you’ll reach for first, from stovetop to grill.
